ygData.subject: Re: Just joined
ygData.msgSnippet: wah, at least u can still go and do it. My paladin have to start by killing decaying skel to get rusty weapon and do it from there.... ... -- Gary Qui Hong
ygData.messageBody:
wah, at least u can still go and do it. My paladin have to start by killing decaying skel to get rusty weapon and do it from there....

Sereph wrote:

> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> My equipment are 99.99% in dungeon that are super camped in Cazic (Solesek A/B, Upper/Lower Guk, Cazic, OOT's Oracle, Najera), and since I'm a
> freaking enchanter, I cannot out nuke a wiz if one decides to steal kills from me (well, I can try to charm the mob and piss off the wiz......)
>
> Will take longer for me to gather back my equipment then hitting 50
>
> Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:
>
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> >
> > wah, what u worry? with ur spells, and lvl , u can get back on ur feet very fast. Imagine my paladin kana that. 5kpp worth of stuff gone...
> > I will quit for sure.
> >
> > Sereph wrote:
> >
> > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > >
> > > Well, my lvl 39(exact XP condition before she "died", means, will hit 40 in 2 weeks if I play there) enchanter was recently revived at
> > > Cazic after sending treatening e-mails to Verant, but it NAKED. Else, no one is on Cazic.
> > >
> > > Sabella Anna Estasis, currently banging head against the wall for the lost of 1000plat of equipment.
> > >
> > > kwchow@... wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: kwchow@...
> > > >
> > > > Hi All,
> > > >
> > > > Just joined this after hearing from Kalandra of Innoruuk about this place.
> > > >
> > > > Currently I appear on Innoruuk as Yuffie the Cleric or Melodeuss the Bard. Or Ungaroth the TSK on Cazic Thule if anybody plays there.
> > > >
> > > > Give me a tell if you are looking for a party or questing, goodluck and Gud Bashing!
> > > >
> > > > EQ Addict
